benchmark_details.name: SIMUL BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: A benchmark designed to evaluate large language models (LLMs) across a diverse collection of creative simulation tasks, such as acting as a Linux terminal or playing text games with users.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate LLMsâ€™ performance across different simulation tasks and facilitate the development of more capable models.

data.source: Publicly accessible GitHub repository named 'Awesome ChatGPT Prompts' and generated tasks

methodology.calculation: Mean scores across numerous testing scripts covering diverse simulation tasks.
methodology.interpretation: A score of 1 to 10 based on helpfulness, relevance, accuracy, depth, creativity, and level of detail.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4-turbo outperforms other models in the hard subset of SIMUL BENCH.
methodology.validation: Performance evaluations based on user-agent interactions

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Few toxicity in the dataset with appropriate screening measures.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Licensed by CC BY NC 4.0 (allowing only non-commercial use).
